data.name: Ne no Kami - The Two Princess Knights of Kyoto Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This is the original soundtrack to Ne no Kami - The Two Princess Knights of Kyoto.

This soundtrack features 13 tracks including the theme song Waltz of the Princess Knights of Kyoto sung by vocalist Yuriko Himekusa as well as a bonus arrange track by Emmanuel Lagumbay featuring Kristin Naigus on shakuhachi, English horn, and flute.

Soundtrack composed by: s_e_beat + Egawa Souichirou
01. Composed by s_e_beat + Egawa Souichirou, Lyrics: Fenrir Vier, Vocalist: Yuriko Himekusa
03. Composed by s_e_beat + Egawa Souichirou, Lyrics: Fenrir Vier, Vocalist: Mizuho
07. Composed by s_e_beat + Egawa Souichirou, Lyrics: Ruse Kazunari, Vocalist: ming-zi
13. Arrangement and additional music by: Emmanuel Lagumbay, Shakuhachi, English horn, and flute: Kristin Naigus
